job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.industry: Health, Wellness and Fitness,Medical Devices,Information Technology and Services
job.description: ltstronggtltstronggtthe opportunityltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtteladoc health is transforming how people access and experience healthcare recognized as the world leader in virtual care we are partnering with over a thousand clients to serve hundreds of thousands soon millions of people living with chronic conditions every day teladoc health offers a whole person virtual care platform that empowers all people everywhere to live their healthiest lives by transforming the healthcare experience from acute and primary care to chronic care mental health and specialty care our team of data scientists aggregate and interpret substantial amounts of health data and information to create actionable personalized and timely health signals for our members this approach delivers better clinical and financial outcomes while creating a different and better healthcare experience for people everywhereltbrgtltbrgtthe machine learning effort is part of the data science team at teladoc health in your role as a machine learning engineer you will work closely with machine learning scientists data engineering teams and different stakeholders to create scalable data processing machine learning pipelines and services for applied health signal platform capability that drives teladoc healths products and business forward your efforts and your teams contributions will have a big impact on leading personalized wholeperson virtual care by better understanding members even better than themselves from diverse data sourcesltbrgtltbrgtthis is an opportunity to use technical rigor to apply scalable data processing tools and machine learning algorithms to realworld business problems and engineer deploy measure and iterate ml in productionltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtresponsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt design develop deploy and maintain productiongrade scalable data transformation machine learning and deep learning code pipelines and dashboards manage data and model versioning training tuning serving experiment and evaluation tracking dashboards ltligtltligt design and implement appropriate data warehouses and schemas for the etl and machine learning pipelines manage etl and machine learning model lifecycle develop deploy monitor maintain and update data and models in production ltligtltligt use python sql spark tensorflow and pytorch to write clean reusable and robust code for dataengineering and machine learning pipelines this includes data transformation feature engineering unsupervised learning supervised learning and reinforcement learning ltligtltligt implement engineering solutions for ahs outputs end to end including cicd scaling logging monitoring of services modeling work product integration ee testing and defining slas between microservices ltligtltligt promote and rolemodel best practices of ml model development testing evaluation etc within the team and beyond ltligtltulgt ltstronggtltstronggtcandidate profileltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtltulgtltligt selfdriven individual with extensive experience in building and scaling maintainable software data processing feature extraction and construction and machine learning pipelines including model training serialization evaluation and interpretation ltligtltligt years experience in machine learning engineering roles in saas or consumer companies ltligtltligt a masters degree or higher in computer science machine learning information systems engineering or a related field ltligtltligt ability to write clean robust and reusable code in python spark and sql familiarity with big data platforms like spark and dask machine learning frameworks like tensorflow keras or pytorch and libraries like scikitlearn ltligtltligt familiarities with the cloud platform etl ml pipeline and api service tools like aws jenkins databricks sagemaker mlflow flask airflow or similar ltligtltligt deep knowledge of probability statistics and ml algorithms familiarity with deep learning and reinforcement learning would be a plus ltligtltligt experience with agile sprint processes to deliver ml work ltligtltligt willingness to learn new ml platforms and tools as well as propose and help teams adopt new tools ltligtltligt great active listening skills to infer product needs and underlying context ltligtltligt ability to collaborate effectively with peers and respect for member privacy ltligtltulgt ltstronggtltstronggtwhy join teladoc healthltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtltstronggta new category in healthcareltstronggt teladoc health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtour work truly mattersltstronggt recognized as the world leader in wholeperson virtual care teladoc health uses proprietary health signals and personalized interactions to drive better health outcomes across the full continuum of care at every stage in a persons health journey ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtmake an impact ltstronggtin more than countries and ranked best in klas for virtual care platforms in teladoc health leverages more than a decade of expertise and datadriven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtfocus on peopleltstronggt teladoc health has been recognized as a top employer by numerous media and professional organizations talented passionate individuals make the difference in this fastmoving collaborative and inspiring environment ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtdiversity and inclusionltstronggt at teladoc health we believe that personal and professional diversity is the key to innovation we hire based solely on your strengths and qualifications and the way in which those strengths can directly contribute to your success in your new position ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtgrowth and innovationltstronggt weve already made healthcare yet remain on the threshold of very big things come grow with us and support our mission to make a tangible difference in the lives of our members
